API Collection# Address Space Types

## [Topics](/documentation/Hypervisor/3181561-address_space_type-enum#topics)

### [Types](/documentation/Hypervisor/3181561-address_space_type-enum#Types)

[`var HV_VM_SPACE_DEFAULT: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vm_space_default)The value that represents the default VM address space.## [See Also](/documentation/Hypervisor/3181561-address_space_type-enum#see-also)

### [Common types](/documentation/Hypervisor/3181561-address_space_type-enum#Common-types)

[`typealias hv_uvaddr_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_uvaddr_t)The type of a user virtual address.[`typealias hv_gpaddr_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gpaddr_t)The type of a guest physical address (GPA).[`typealias hv_memory_flags_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_memory_flags_t)The permissions for guest physical memory regions.[Memory Permissions](/documentation/hypervisor/1447309-memory_permissions-enum)Enumeration values that describe memory permissions.[`typealias hv_vm_space_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vm_space_t)The type of a guest-address space.
